replies.body: Okay ill be here for a while

why did you get rid of Wolfs W heal passive and make it so all of wolfs hunts are in the enemy jungle? ;-; yes, she is mega strong overall, but you gotta work for it, which all is fair, but she's technically the weakest jungler of all time in terms of defense, since she is ADC. and because of that, since majority of champion junglers are fighter or tank, kindred has a extremely hard time even surviving when there is a fight/team fight, even with Lambs Respite, and even then, they can just walk in there as well, which in all technicality makes her the most fragile jungler, and it can easily make you die with the blink of a eye.

When i saw kindred{{champion:203}}  on the free champion list, i have only seen her played ONCE, while everyone else was played 6-8 times, which also shows lack of desire to play her because of her fragileness and wolf's annoying hunts.  this is my biggest concern about kindred's{{champion:203}}  survivability and i really think it's unfair she's that fragile while everyone else can easily kill her, on top of wolf hunting in enemy jungle. So what made you make those changes/mechanics to kindred{{champion:203}} ?
Are you kidding? Revealed on the 15th. It's been 2 weeks just release kindred already!!!
